narration.welcome: Siyakwamukela kwiNeural Savanna, apho sifunda i-AI ngobulumko base-Afrika.
narration.lesson1: Ngendlela ye-Ubuntu, siqala uhambo lwethu kunye. Namhlanje sifunda ngama-neural networks ngobulumko bomthi we-acacia.
narration.lesson2: Njengemizi yomthi we-baobab, ama-neural networks adibanisa kwaye abelana ngolwazi. Sikhula sinamandla kunye.
narration.lesson3: Ingonyama izingela ngomonde nangamasu. Kanjalo nathi kufuneka sijongane ne-machine learning ngobulumko nangokunakekela.
narration.lesson4: Amanzi ageleza njengedatha kumanethiwekhi yethu. Iqolo ngalinye liba negalelo ekugelezweni kolwazi.
narration.lesson5: Indlovu ayilibali, kwaye nama-neural networks yethu ayilibali. Inkumbulo sisiseko sokufunda.
